name: World of Povalkus: Chosen One
description:
Summary

World of Povalkus is based on the distant planet known as Povalkus. The planet, not known by any Earthling, was actually once apart of Earth. Povalkus eventually got the bad side of things: Mutation, Radiation, etc. Are you willing to take control of the Chosen One and save Povalkus?

Key Features

Along your journey to defeat the king of the mutants, you can recruit companions to help you fight.

During different quests, you can easily have access to nearby shops to buy armor and weapons and customize your character's appearance.

In the towns, not only are there shops, but you can also go to inns to regain lost health.

There are hidden easter eggs throughout the gameplay. You can sell them for significant amounts of money to gear up even better than before!

Contacts

Having trouble launching the game?

Any bugs to be reported?
